name: Hunting City - Sniper Pro Game
description:
Hunting City - Sniper Pro Gameis an incredible test to your shooting skills and ability; perform well on this game and become a good sniper assassin!Aim and shoot the terrorist in this FPS game, this is a huge death assault city sniper game. On which have many interesting aiming shooting and action you have never before see. On this game have ultra-realistic 3d graphics and cool animation.
Features:
- Realistic 3D city Environment
- Very smooth control of sniper guns
- Improve your skills and accomplish critical levels
- Optimize for all android devices
- Addicting FPS game-play
